Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 6th round, 110th overall pick, by Boston in 1966...
Injured on 4/23/1966 with a Blister On Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 7/21/1969 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1973...
Injured on 4/30/1973 with a Broken Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/1973 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/1979 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/14/1980...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/8/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $1,930,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/2/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/21/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
